# Sandbox App (Generated by Devassist)

## Run locally
1. Copy env
   - cp .env.example .env
   - fill values (DATABASE_URL can stay as sqlite file)
2. Install
   - npm install
3. Setup DB
   - npx prisma migrate dev --name init
4. Start
   - npm run dev

## Notes
- This scaffold is intentionally minimal but real (Next.js + Prisma + auth routes + Stripe checkout route).
- Devassist will evolve the codebase through chat, always verifying builds before updating preview.
